alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 6:17AM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Salt River and Wyoming Ranges and Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a tenth of a mile at times. People recreating in the backcountry could become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
